intro.question: Do you have a minute?
intro.text1: We don't need more than that to tell you a love story that will change your life
intro.text2: We know that nowadays our attention runs out quickly. Too fast. Nobody has time for stories. Although, as humans, we continue to need them.
intro.bottomText1: Yes, a minute of total love.
intro.text3: That's why we would like to show you what we can do in a 1 minute video reel, but first we need access to your camera.
intro.bottomText2: Remember, if you blink you miss it...
intro.challengeText: If you want to watch this video, you'll have to prove that you can keep your attention. If you blink, your minute is up.

home.storiesText1: 25 years of professional experience. Half a life telling stories and the other halfâ€¦ Well too. Because ours is, also, vocational.
home.storiesText2: We have done many TV commercials, infinite television reports, live connections... Imagine having all that professional background adapted to your business.
home.storiesText3: Professional quality videos, shot and edited with mobile phones last generation.
home.storiesText4: Thanks to all this and with the media in our hands, we deliver instantly so you can immediately share with your audience.
home.textHighlightBefore: Where some look, there are others who see
home.textHighlightSpan3: tell them what you do in real time is something that is here.
home.textHighlightSpan4: That's why our recording and editing service with latest generation smartphones it is fast,
home.textHighlightSpan6: so you can share quickly what you want to say.
home.footerText: If you want to send us some love, this is the right place to do it.
home.screensaverText: This minute is yours, take advantage of it!

about.aboutText1: OMOL is a recording and editing service with the latest generation smartphones, fast, delivered almost instantly, for quick sharing.
about.aboutText2: Warhol pontificated that everyone deserved his 15 minutes of fame. Nowadays, that attention runs out much faster, it is better to condense our message in just over a minute.
about.aboutText2After: That's right: A minute of total love.
about.marqueeText: They can forget about your logo, but not about how you made them feel

projects.projectText: We want to show our beloved work and if you want to be the next, don't think twice!

404.bottomText: Giving and receiving love is always important
